sentences.sContent: Forty thousand children a day die from preventable diseases.
sentences.sCn: 每天有四万儿童死于本可以防止的疾病。

sentences.sContent: ...He added that he had warned Mclaughlin that three preventable accidents in one year could lead to his discharge...

synos.tran: 可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的

words.tran: 预期的；以前的；预防的；先行的

trans.tranOther: Preventable diseases, illnesses, or deaths could be stopped from occurring
